Please note that this property is for sale by the Modern Method of Auction which is not to be confused with Traditional auction. The Modern Method of Auction is a flexible buyer-friendly method of purchase. We do not require the buyer to exchange contracts immediately, but grant 28 days to achieve exchange of contracts from the date the buyer's solicitor is in receipt of the draft contracts and a further 28 days thereafter to complete. Allowing the additional time to exchange on the property means interested parties can proceed with traditional residential finance. Upon close of a successful auction or if the vendor accepts an offer during the auction, the buyer will be required to put down a non-refundable Reservation Fee of 3.6% (inclusive of VAT) subject to a minimum of £6,000 (inclusive of VAT) which secures the transaction and takes the property off the market. The buyer will be required to sign an Acknowledgment of Reservation form to confirm acceptance of terms prior to solicitors being instructed. Copies of the Reservation form and all terms and conditions can be found in the Legal Pack which can be downloaded for free from the auction section of our website or requested from our Auction Department.

Please note this property is subject to an undisclosed Reserve Price which is generally no more than 10% in excess of the Starting Bid. Both the Starting Bid and Reserve Price can be subject to change. Our primary duty of care is to the vendor. Terms and conditions apply to the Modern Method of Auction, which is operated by Douglas Allen powered by iam-sold Ltd.

detailedDescription:
This is a beautifully presented two bedroom ground floor apartment situated moments from the buzz of High Road Leyton.

Leyton Midland Overground Station and Leyton Underground Station are both within a 10 minute walk and there are bus links outside the property to access the Victoria Line at Blackhorse Road and The city.

This apartment has an impressive open plan sitting room and integrated kitchen with exceptionally high ceilings and engineered wooden flooring. A perfect space for entertaining and relaxing. There are two bedrooms, one of which is a double with built in storage cuboards. There is also a family sized bathroom. The apartment has additional storage in the wide hallways, perfect for clutter-free living.
Out and about

Coronation Gardens - A beautiful Edwardian park with a band stand and a maze. Home to a weekly Saturday food market.

Leyton Technical - Impressive Public House in the old Town Hall.
Marmelo Kitchen - Fantastic restaurant on Francis Road.
Yardarm - Trendy Winery, delicatessen and bar.

detailedDescription:
This truly unique 5 bedroom Victorian period home built in 1892 is packed with original features and is located in one of North Chingford most enviable positions with views over Epping Forest. This exquisite property has 3 receptions, a kitchen breakfast room, 5 bedrooms, gated parking for a number of cars and a landscaped rear garden plus many more features.

Rare to the market is this stunning 5 period Victorian home dating back to 1892 is located in an enviable position on the sought after tree lined Forest Avenue with stunning views overlooking Chingford Plains and Epping Forest.

The accommodation is arranged over three floors and comprises of a spacious entrance hall with stained glass front door and marble flooring, beautiful lounge reception, a large reception with lounge and dining area with views onto the garden, kitchen/breakfast room and there is also the added bonus of a separate utility room and a ground floor bathroom. On the first floor you have 3 double bedrooms with the master having views onto Epping Forest and beyond. The top floor which would have originally been a servants quarters has 2 large bedrooms and a dressing room that leads to a shower room.

The property is full of charm and offers many original features in all rooms and has to be viewed to be appreciate the full character of this stunning house.

Front garden provides a paved driveway with off road parking and gates leading to the side of the house where there is further parking space. The rear garden is south facing with a large lawn area and a paved terrace for outside seating and dining. In addition there is a raised decking area providing more seating space and a summer house.

The location is within a few minutes of Station Road which offers an excellent range of shops and restaurants. In addition there are many excellent local private and state schools close by. Excellent commuter links with Chingford Main Line Station is a short walk away. The property is 20 minutes to Liverpool Street from Chingford Station or alternatively within three stops on the same overground line when changing at Walthamstow Central the Victoria line tube can be accessed providing direct access to Oxford Circus.

Forest Avenue is situated on the door steps of Epping Forest and Chingford plains where you can enjoy forest walk and many outdoor activities.

title: 5 bed semi-detached house for sale

detailedDescription:
A beautifully located two bedroom apartment in a purpose-built gated development, complete with concierge and communal garden. The ancient greenery of Wanstead Flats is right outside your front door, while Leytonstone High Road's shops and bars are just twelve minutes on foot and also High Street Wanstead.

You're well placed for public transport - Leytonstone tube station is just a sixteen minute leafy stroll away and will get you directly to Liverpool Street in fourteen minutes, or Oxford Circus in twenty five. Stratford, for the Queen Elizabeth Park and Westfield Shopping Centre, is just two stops and five minutes away.

If you lived here...

You'll be enjoying country living in the heart of East London - not just among the leafy environs and spectacular views of Bush Wood right outside and Wanstead flats, but also in your well-maintained communal garden - a perfect mix of manicured lawn and a canopy of foliage. Your tri-aspect lounge comes in at a generous 220 square foot with recessed spot lighting, engineered timber flooring and ample space for dining.

Your master bedroom is a generous double of 160 square feet, while next door your second bedroom is a seventy square foot single; both coming with those amazing views. The kitchen is a welcoming space with slate tiling underfoot, a handsome timber suite and gleaming white tiles. Finally you have off-street parking and drivers can be on the A12 in less than five minutes.

Fancy a stroll? Head through the woods and you're in Wanstead Flats - the greatest expanse of natural space for miles around, perfect for morning jogs and evening strolls. Heronry Pond is a twelve minute amble away with the equally tranquil Chalet Wood, Perch Pond and The Basin within further walking distance.

What else?

- This striking designer development has a impressive reception, on-site concierge and secure entryphone system. A long lease means you won't have any renewal worries.
- You have thirteen primaries/secondaries within a one mile radius, thirteen rated 'Good' or better by Ofsted, including the 'Outstanding' Davies Lane Primary School, a mere eleven minute stroll away.
- For your new local there's no better choice than the nearby North Star, a hidden gem of an old-fashioned pub just half a mile away, tucked away from the main road and serving the best Thai food.

Hallway

Lounge/ Dining Room (4.48m x 5.35m (14'8" x 17'6"))

Kitchen (4.48m x 1.90m (14'8" x 6'2"))

Bedroom (2.09m x 3.88m (6'10" x 12'8" ))

Bedroom (3.45m x 5.30m (11'3" x 17'4"))

Bathroom (2.26m x 2.04m (7'4" x 6'8"))

A word from the owner....

"Living in Belgrave Heights has been an absolute delight. From waking up to the birds singing, the squires playing together to hiking in the forest next door plus the view from my windows, its hard to remember i am living right in the middle of east London. This flats is really large compared to those i remember viewing before i settled on this 8 years ago but now have to leave London so its time to say goodbye to it. Its a very secure building, with plenty of space and storage, there really isn't any fault to mention, you have to see it to believe it. The best thing about living in Wanstead is the community and village vibe you get here not to mention the 3 tube line nearby plus an overhead line nearby in Wanstead park."

title: 2 bed flat for sale

detailedDescription:
A bright and sparkling two bedroom apartment on the second floor of a unique development on the site of one of our borough's most legendary attractions; the Walthamstow Dog Track Stadium. Many original features of this historic attraction are preserved and on site facilities are superb.

As well as a private on site gym, you have well maintained communal grounds and play areas, elements of the original historic architecture and allocated resident's parking. Drivers can be on the North Circular in just a couple of minutes.

If you lived here

You'll be enjoying London apartment living in one of our borough's most famous landmarks, with Parade Gardens itself following the course of the original track. Inside, you have a pleasantly spacious, 280 square feet kitchen/reception, smartly finished with broad blonde hardwood underfoot, glossy dove grey fitted cabinets and direct access to your private balcony. A lovely bit of outside space with views over the development.

The light hardwood flows out into the hallway where you have a welcome amount of fitted storage and gives way to cosy grey carpet in your master bedroom, a substantial 130 square foot double with floor to ceiling windows facing an equally generous suite of mirrored storage. Finally, bedroom two's an elegant single, ideal for use as a home working space while your bathroom features immaculate large format tiling from tub to ceiling and a huge mirror over the vanity unit.

Outside, you have a choice of bus routes right outside the development which will whisk you to Walthamstow Central in just thirteen minutes. Here you have direct, twenty minute runs to Oxford Circus and Liverpool Street, the Empire Cinema entertainment complex (nine screens and half a dozen adjacent restaurants), Walthamstow High Street (home to Europe's longest street market) and the Walthamstow Mall.

What else?

- One of our proudest landmarks, the open green spaces and landscaped gardens of Lloyd Park, is just a ten minute walk away and home to cafes, courts and all manner of sports clubs and classes, including the ever-popular Yoga Me Happy.
- For your new local we have to recommend The Dog & Duck, a family friendly foodie pub just a half mile on foot with a delightful beer garden and a fine line in sourdough pizzas.
- Whatever your fitness goals, Chingford's Bannatyne Health Club, with gym, swimming pool and health suite is a 'no-excuses' six minute walk away.

Kitchen/ Dining Room (6.66m x 4.13m (21'10" x 13'6" ))

Balcony (3.90m x 1.60m (12'9" x 5'2" ))

Bedroom (3.08m x 3.92m (10'1" x 12'10" ))

Bathroom (1.96m x 2.14m (6'5" x 7'0" ))

Bedroom (3.14m x 2.48m (10'3" x 8'1" ))

A word from the owner....

"It has a been a lovely first home and you have all your amenities on your doorstep. Local supermarkets and tube 15 mins away. Great location and very friendly community and neighbours."

address: Nash House, Prospect Hill, London E17
detailedDescription:
Century 21 Walthamstow are delighted to reveal this impeccable opportunity this own a one bedroom flat between Walthamstow Central station and Wood Street station. The location is favourable for accessing the best of Walthamstow, with the vast array of exquisite parks, the Walthamstow Village, the Waltham Forest college and an abundance of delightful shops down Walthamstow market, Hoe Street and Wood Street.

This is a grand prospect for stepping on to the London property ladder as a first time buyer who wishes to live in London zone 3 with a mere 30 minute journey to of the heart of Central-North London’s Kings Cross station.

One can rarely reside in London at a mere 5-10 minute walk from parks, galleries, restaurants, shopping malls, forests, leisure centres, schools, tube stations and famous conservation areas; this property is no exception.

This Upper Walthamstow property attracts tenants seeking to rent respectable and affordable living spaces, which is something to take in consideration if seeking to let this property. The demand, the relative ease and the practicality of renting studios and 1 bedroom flats in the area are of the upmost abundance due to their short supply.

The features of this accommodation include a roomy reception receiving ample light through its large scale window, a kitchen with all the typical fittings, a complete bathroom and plenty of storage space in numerous closets throughout. The flooring of the property contains clean carpet. No need to worry about cold winters because the central heating is in good working order with radiators fitted throughout. The structure forms part of a complex in a reasonably quiet neighbourhood at the top end of Prospect Hill near the Town Hall.

Enjoy the peaceful Lloyds park or William Morris Gallery; shop around town in Walthamstow Market, Europe’s longest high street market. Taste local and foreign cuisine at an array of restaurants throughout the area.

It would be great idea to come and take a look to see if this is the property you may have been looking for. Contact us for an early viewing so that you can avoid any disappointments.

detailedDescription:
Kings Group estate agents are proud to present this beautiful one bedroom purpose built flat. The property is being sold on a chain free basis and benefits from 113 years remaining on the lease. The property accessed via a phone entry system for added security. You can either take the stairs or lift to the properties front door. As you enter the property you are greeted by a spacious entrance hall with ample space to remove coats and shoes. The entrance hall also benefits from a large built in storage cupboard and boasts plenty of extra storage space. The full length Lounge/Kitchen/Diner benefits from a sizeable window that floods the room with natural light. There is also access to a full length balcony which gives views of the central London skyline. The kitchen area comes with fully integrated appliances as well as a breakfast island. The spacious double bedroom is also accessible from the entrance hall and again has a sizeable window with a fantastic view. The three piece family bathroom completes the flat and has been maintained to a very high standard. The property also benefits from allocated parking as well as bicycle storage. The property is situated just off of Higham Hill road and has easy access to both Hillyfield Primary Academy and Whittingham Community Primary School as well as the local shops, pub and restaurants on Higham Hill road itself. A short half a mile walk and you will be on the Victoria line via Blackhorse Road as well as half a mile in the other direction and you will have access to Lea Valley Park with access to the lakes, bicycle tracks and bridle paths. Do not miss the opportunity to view this fantastic property.
